createTargetSavings(string,uint256,uint8.details: Creates a new target savings goal

params._durationDays: The duration of the savings period in days
params._purpose: The purpose of the savings goal

saveLockFunds(address,string,uint256,uin.details: Creates a new save lock for the user

params._amount: The amount of USDC to lock

withdrawLockedFunds(uint256).details: Allows user to withdraw funds from a save lock

params._lockId: The ID of the save lock to withdraw from
